## TrackerCore.setBase64Encoding() method

Turn base 64 encoding on or off

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBase64Encoding(encode: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  encode | boolean | Whether to encode payload |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
